ygData.subject: Re: Malachite in Qeynos? NO MORE?!?!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I just made the trip yesterday, after writing down the exact prices (down to copper). There s a difference of 2 gold, 8 silver and 1 copper between the
ygData.messageBody:
According to myself:
> Merchants are racists. Even in your guildhouse do they rip you. Over the
> 8th level spells, I spare almost a platinum by going back to Felwithe
> over the Freeport prices.

I just made the trip yesterday, after writing down the exact prices (down
to copper). There's a difference of 2 gold, 8 silver and 1 copper between
the Freeport prices and the Felwithe prices, adding to over a 1 platinum
when I purchased all the 8 levels spells I wanted (Shock of Frost, Shadow
Step, Shielding, Eye of Zoom).

It made a large difference. I was unable to purchase all spells if I
remained in Freeport, but making the trip was worth it.

The difference in percentage remains at level 12; there's a 4 gold
difference in prices. I'll see if I still feel the need to spare 2pp
over the 12th level spells.

--
